LocaleResource.Name: Admin.PromotionsHome.Affiliates.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: Affiliates allow you to generate a unique URL for partner sites that link to your store.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.PromotionsHome.Affiliates.Description2
LocaleResource.Value: When a customer clicks this link from an affiliate's site, the customer is tagged with the affiliate's unique ID. If the customer proceeds to place an order, the order is also tagged. This allows you to analyse the value of the traffic from the affiliate's site.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.PromotionsHome.Campaigns.Description
LocaleResource.Value: You can use campaigns to easily send promotion emails to the customers that are registered on your site. This is a great way of informing your customers of new offers and keep them coming back to your store.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.PromotionsHome.Discounts.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: Discounts can be used to deduct a set value or percentage from individual items or the total value of an order. You can set a date range for a discount as well as generating coupon codes for your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.PromotionsHome.Discounts.Description2
LocaleResource.Value: Discounts can also be restricted to a specific customer role, allowing you to reward your higher value customers.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.PromotionsHome.intro
LocaleResource.Value: Use the links on this page to manage store promotion features, such as affiliates, advertising/marketing campaigns, discounts, pricelists and external promotion providers.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.PromotionsHome.Pricelist.Description
LocaleResource.Value: You can use the Pricelist feature to generate pricelists that can be consumed by external sites or for the use of customers. Pricelists can be created for your entire product catalog, or for individually selected items. You can also make price adjustments to the items on the pricelist.

MessageTemplate.Name: Customer.WelcomeMessage
MessageTemplate.Subject: Welcome to %Store.Name%
MessageTemplate.Body:
We welcome you to %Store.Name%.

You can now take part in the various services we have to offer you. Some of these services include:

Permanent Cart - Any products added to your online cart remain there until you remove them, or check them out.
Address Book - We can now deliver your products to another address other than yours! This is perfect to send birthday gifts direct to the birthday-person themselves.
Order History - View your history of purchases that you have made with us.
Products Reviews - Share your opinions on products with our other customers.

For help with any of our online services, please email the store-owner: %Store.Email%.

Note: This email address was given to us by one of our customers. If you did not signup to be a member, please send an email to %Store.Email%.

You have received a new private message.

MessageTemplate.Name: NewCustomer.Notification
MessageTemplate.Subject: New customer registration
MessageTemplate.Body:
%Store.Name%

A new customer registered with your store. Below are the customer's details:
Full name: %Customer.FullName%
Email: %Customer.Email%

MessageTemplate.Name: NewReturnRequest.StoreOwnerNotification
MessageTemplate.Subject: %Store.Name%. New return request.
MessageTemplate.Body:
%Store.Name%

%Customer.FullName% (%Customer.Email%) has just submitted a new return request. Details are below:
Request ID: %ReturnRequest.ID%
Product: %ReturnRequest.Product.Quantity% x Product: %ReturnRequest.Product.Name%
Reason for return: %ReturnRequest.Reason%
Requested action: %ReturnRequest.RequestedAction%
Customer comments:
%ReturnRequest.CustomerComment%

MessageTemplate.Name: ReturnRequestStatusChanged.CustomerNotification
MessageTemplate.Subject: %Store.Name%. Return request status was changed.
MessageTemplate.Body:
%Store.Name%

Hello %Customer.FullName%,
Your return request #%ReturnRequest.ID% status has been changed.

MessageTemplate.Name: Wishlist.EmailAFriend
MessageTemplate.Subject: %Store.Name%. Wishlist
MessageTemplate.Body:
%Store.Name%

%Customer.Email% was shopping on %Store.Name% and wanted to share a wishlist with you.


For more info click here


%EmailAFriend.PersonalMessage%

%Store.Name%
